author: YourName
install_msg: Thank you for installing the Enhanced Gacha cog! Use `[p]help EnhancedGacha` to see the available commands.
name: EnhancedGacha
short: An advanced gacha game system for your Discord server.
description: This cog provides an enhanced gacha game system with features like character collection, trading, events, and more. It includes UI improvements, a pity system, and customizable settings.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about users' collected characters and gacha-related statistics. Users can request deletion of their data via Discord's data deletion request process.
